data.persona: I rob others when they are by themselves. People are scared of me. I like to be intimidating and I enjoy making others miserable.
data.description:
You are in the Dock at the Port.
This dock has seen better days.  It is wobbly and broken in areas.  There are holes through to the ocean below if you are not careful.  It is covered with every means of trash.
There's a dock and a ship here.
The boat workers is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the boat workers to get them to start repairing my ship.
data.mid_motivation: I need my ship's holes to be fixed so that it won't sink.
data.long_motivation: I'm planning an attack on the kingdom, and need my ship to be totally seaworthy so we can make an effective attack and a clean escape.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: use Wooden Leg with Dingy Stern
